sense.definition: indicating a LOCATION that surrounds (or can be viewed as surrounding) something else (e.g., the cow in the meadow)
indicating the (perhaps abstract) place where information is stored, written, or perceived (e.g., stored in the database)
indicating the LOCATION (typically a body part/region) where contact (X1) is made, typically some form of striking, AND in may not be replaced by into in this context (e.g., hit him in the jaw)
indicating clothing being worn; wearing (e.g., was in a blue dress)
indicating a state/condition/form, often a mental/emotional one that is being experienced (it may in addition be the trigger of some response) (e.g., wriggled in agony)
(into) expressing motion or extension to a position within or surrounded by (e.g., jumped in the pit)
(into) indicating a state/condition/form that is entered (e.g., tie in a knot)
indicating a TIME_PERIOD during which something happens or continues (e.g., in the morning)
indicating an age range (e.g., in their 20s)
indicating the substance/material something is made of (usually somewhat restricted) (e.g., sweater in wool)
indicating the language, medium, or means of encoding (e.g., spoke in German)
indicating the color or pattern of X1 (e.g., clothes in blue)
indicating the key of a piece of music (e.g., in B flat)
indicating a group as a context (e.g., tension in his squadron)
indicating a group/organization that someone/something is a member/employee of (e.g., he is in the navy)
indicating an academic or occupational subfield or other activity (e.g., he works in astrophysics)
indicating a manner that something happens or is done, often somewhat idiomatic (e.g., done in a neat way)
during; due to exposure to or involvement with (e.g., died in the earthquake)
sense.notes: more for events than for locations... died in the fiery pit is different from died in the earthquake. probably needs a little more specificity

sense.definition: expressing participation with an activity (e.g., he was involved in the planning)
indicating the aspect with respect to which a change occurs (e.g., change in its color)
indicating the quality or aspect with respect to which an assertion or judgment is made; similar to the idiom "in terms of" (e.g., brilliant in its style)
used in conjunction with 'delight' or 'interest'
expressing the length of time before a future event is expected to happen (e.g., will happen in 1 hour)
